CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The corresponding open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( I SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and PCE of the devices are also summarized in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| open-circuit voltage (Voc) |
| short-circuit current (Isc) |
| fill factor (FF) |
| PCE |

The entities "open-circuit voltage (Voc)", "short-circuit current (Isc)", and "fill factor (FF)" are mentioned as properties of the devices, and "PCE" is also mentioned as a property of the devices. These are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCE |

The only clear "Material Name" entity in the paragraph is "PCE". The other entities, "open-circuit voltage (Voc)", "short-circuit current (Isc)", and "fill factor (FF)", are properties of the devices and do not refer to a specific material.
